messages.message: yup, ok with upgrade assuming 0.15 -> 0.16 doesn't introduce other issues. what does the changelog say?

Sounds good. I will put out a pr for the upgrade. There’s one line in the changelog regarding canny, “Canny now produces the same output regardless of dtype (#3919)“. Otherwise, I’m not sure if any of the other changes affect anything in our codebase: https://github.com/scikit-image/scikit-image/blob/master/doc/release/release_0.16.rst
um that's quite a lot of API changes in 0.16.1
@lydia should we hold off on the upgrade then? I think I can work around the bug if needed
i can check if we use any of the funcs with api changes
ok just checked if we use any of the functions changed - we're good!
can you add me as a reviewer on the bump PR?
you’ll have to modify requirements.in (http://requirements.in) and then regenerate the requirements.txt with pip-compile fyi @Jonathan Shih
